dicts.name: 必应
dicts.insertCss: html, body {  overflow: hidden;}.sidebar,header,footer {  display:none;}::-webkit-scrollbar {  width: 5px;  background: -webkit-linear-gradient(0, #eee 50%, white 100%);}::-webkit-scrollbar-button {  width: 5px;  background: -webkit-linear-gradient(0, #eee 50%, white 100%);}::-webkit-scrollbar-track {  background: 0 0;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {  background: #000;  -webkit-transition: 0.3s;  transition: 0.3s;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {  background-color: #f5f5f5;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:active {  background-color: #fff;} div.contentPadding{margin:0}
dicts.insertJs: let re = document.getElementById('miniBar');  re.parentNode.removeChild(re);  re = document.getElementById('bgPro');  re.parentNode.removeChild(re)

dicts.name: 有道
dicts.insertCss: #hd, .content-wrp .dict-dl, #dictNav, #ft, #outer,div[style="position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; z-index: 201;"] {  display: none;}::-webkit-scrollbar {  display:none;}::-webkit-scrollbar-button {  width: 5px;  background: -webkit-linear-gradient(0, #eee 50%, white 100%);}::-webkit-scrollbar-track {  background: 0 0;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {  background: #000;  -webkit-transition: 0.3s;  transition: 0.3s;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {  background-color: #f5f5f5;}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:active {  background-color: #fff;} body.p-dict{margin:0!important}
